title: How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
message: hello guys, have got an 820-4924 with a red light coming out of the Audio jack, causing my speakers to grey out on desktop , please how do I disable this ?

title: How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
message:
Did you try to clean the audio jack first?
Check the contact between pins 1/2 of J6600.

title: How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
message: what should I look out for ? the solder joints are good

title: How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
message:
In normal mode, pins 1/2 must be in contact.
Do you get headphones sound?

title: How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
message: yes contact is good , though am not entirely sure what you mean by contact, if you are talking about the joints , yes they are good

title: How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
message: Pins 1/2 MUST beep, when nothing inserted on the audio jack...

title: How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
message: beep as one or beep to ground ?

title: How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
message:
Did you look at audio jack in schematic?
What means for you the connection inside, between pins 1 & 2?
That connection MUST open only when something is inserted in the jack.
There is another connection which depends if insert headphones, or SPDIF.
But pins 1 & 2 start the detection...

title: How do I bypass SPIDIF on 820-4924
message: ok, thank you for your time
